description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for authentication endpoints including register, login, and retrieving current user information. It sets up routes with validation middleware and links to controller methods.

methods.name: AuthController.register
methods.description: Handles registration of a new user.

methods.name: AuthController.me
methods.description: Retrieves information about the current authenticated user.

methods.name: validateBody
methods.description: Middleware function to validate request body payloads.

methods.name: authenticate
methods.description: Middleware function to authenticate the user via bearer token.

calls: validateBody({ email: { type: 'string' }, password: { type: 'string' }, name: { type: 'string', optional: true } })
